page.title: 16Thickwood
page.content: Thickwood is 1.5 kilometres away from Colerne .Thickwood is a hamlet. Thickwood has a farm that rents out holiday homes. There was an old bakery in Thickwood but it is not used any more. Thickwood Estate has seventy houses and Thickwood has twenty five houses. There is a telephone box and a post box. There are two collections of post every day from Monday to Friday. There is a bus stop in the Estate. Thickwood has an old unused gypsy caravan park partly owned by two farmers. Thickwood had an old chapel, in its place are some cottages called chapel cottages. Hall farm cottages are now a cattery and dog kennels they are near Hall farm. There used to be a shop but it closed down. Thickwood is an old hamlet mentioned in the Domesday Book.
